abstract: Aviary, an online software company, introduced a free music application that will compete with desktop software from Adobe and Apple.
snippet: Aviary, an online software company, introduced a free music application that will compete with desktop software from Adobe and Apple.
lead_paragraph: Software companies like Adobe, Apple and Microsoft have long had to battle software pirates. Now these companies are beginning to face some trickier contenders: free Web-based software.

headline.main: Aviary Introduces Free Online Music Software
